channel.title: Web Learning on Learn Javascript
channel.description: Recent content in Web Learning on Learn Javascript

item.title: textarea的應用
item.description: 目的:在textarea中寫JS,然後用按鈕執行。 #pjs-input { overflow: auto; resize: both; border: 1px solid grey; outline: 1px; background-color: transparent; width: 100%; padding: 2px 4px; height: auto; min-height: 10rem; max-height: 20rem; } #pjs-log { overflow: auto; border: 1px solid grey; } value = "HUGO 變數 執行碼: {{< HugoVarTest >}}\n\r執行結果live\r.Page.CurrentSection: Page(/pages/_index.md) used, which then provides data to the partial few issues come up then.\r.Name is not the name of the res ot; . }}\r{{ % r{{ end }}\r紀錄 log 2 如果需要docx ,那要還轉換成blob參考。\ }} \r嵌入檔案: 購物單.

item.title: 練習找中文
item.description: javascript 正規表達式 各種中文匹配 官方 中文,英文範圍: ^[\u4e00-\u9fa5_a-zA-Z0-9]+$ console.log( "貓的中文很爛,連喵都不標準" .split("") .filter(char => /\p{Script=Han}/u.test(char)) //🏷 .join("") ); value = "HUGO 變數 執行碼: {{&lt; HugoVarTest &gt;}}\n\r執行結果live\r.Page.CurrentSection: Page(/pages/_index.md) used, which then provides data to the partial {{ partial &quot;partial.html&quot; . }}.\rA few issues come up then.\r.Name is not the name of the resource file, but of the calling index.md file\r.Resources.GetMatch &quot;*&quot; doesn't return a result\r$.Site.Resources or $.Resources d {{ range sort .
